name: December2025Changelog
observations: Executive Summary: December marks the launch of Copilot FC â€” a comprehensive workspace for developing and managing Custom Agents, Skills, and Instructions for GitHub Copilot in VS Code
Focus: Establishing solid foundation with automated publishing workflows, proper project structure, and robust tooling for skill management
Key improvements: Integration with MCP (Model Context Protocol), automated workspace commands, and enhanced commit quality control through updated Git workflow tools
Custom Agents: Created comprehensive agent ecosystem including PM Changelog Generator, Knowledge Graph Agent, Mermaid Diagram Generator, Issue Writer, and Meta Agent
Custom Agents Improvements: Enhanced Git Committer agent with stricter atomicity rules and expanded file-to-commit-type mapping, updated metadata, migrated to agents/ folder
Portfolio Optimization: Removed seven specialized agents (Conductor, Context7, Implementation, Microsoft-Docs, Research, Verifier, Web-Search) to streamline and avoid overlap
Skills: Added complete skill library including Git Committer, Issue Writer, Skill Creator, VN Payroll calculator, VS Code Docs Researcher, and PDF manipulation skills
Skills Improvements: Enhanced Git Committer skill, moved to skills/ directory
Instructions: Added workspace-specific instructions including meta-guidelines, PowerShell best practices, skills orchestration patterns, runSubagent guidelines
Prompts: Added reusable prompt templates for changelog generation and general prompting, migrated to prompts/ folder
Developer Tools: Implemented automated publishing scripts (PowerShell), VS Code tasks for skill management, workspace configuration with copilot-fc.json, issue metadata extraction
Project Organization: Rebranded to Copilot FC, restructured to top-level folders, removed deprecated directories
Documentation: Added comprehensive README, design decisions, Claude Skills documentation, workflow documentation
